message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am still looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider $8,750 for the product?
